abstract: Monthly Medicare premiums for most beneficiaries will rise in 2012 by $3.50, much smaller increase than had been expected; modest increase could pay political dividends to Pres Obama as he tries to win the votes of older Americans in his bid for re-election.
snippet: A modest increase in Medicare premiums will be welcome to beneficiaries and could pay political dividends to President Obama as he tries to win the votes of older Americans.
lead_paragraph: A modest increase in Medicare premiums will be welcome to beneficiaries and could pay political dividends to President Obama as he tries to win the votes of older Americans.

headline.main: Rise in Medicare Premium Is Lower Than Predicted
headline.print_headline: Rise in Medicare Premium Is Lower Than Predicted
headline.seo: Medicare Premiums Rising Less Than Expected
